quotes.quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.
Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
The key to success is action, and the essential in action is perseverance.
Honesty and loyalty are key. If two people can be honest with each other about everything, that's probably the biggest key to success.
Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
Language is the key to the heart of people.
They key of persistence opens all door closed by resistence.
Let the people discover you! You might have the key of the locked doors in their lives! Open yourself to the world; you might be the magic the world needs!
The key to a wonderful life is to never stop wandering into wonder.
The key for having success is totally rejecting thoughts that try to sow doubts into your conscience.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
Have the courage to say no. Have the courage to face the truth. Do the right thing because it is right. These are the magic keys to living your life with integrity.
Don't give up. Normally it is the last key on the ring which opens the door.
Forgiveness is the key that unlocks the door of resentment and the handcuffs of hatred. It is a power that breaks the chains of bitterness and the shackles of selfishness.
Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
Never put the key to your happiness in somebody else's pocket.
You have greatness in you. The key is to get it out.
The key to all of life is understanding how to add value to others.
Your mental attitude is the most dependable key to your personality.
Why lock yourself in your own cage when someone is handing you a key?
The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
The key to making healthy decisions is to respect your future self. Honor him or her. Treat him or her like you would treat a friend or a loved one.
The keys to patience are acceptance and faith. Accept things as they are, and look realistically at the world around you. Have faith in yourself and in the direction you have chosen.
Positivity, confidence, and persistence are key in life, so never give up on yourself.
Nature holds the key to our aesthetic, intellectual, cognitive and even spiritual satisfaction.
At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
Open all closed minds with the key to understanding.
Idleness is the key of beggary.
It is books that are a key to the wide world if you can't do anything else, read all that you can.
Six essential qualities that are the key to success Sincerity, personal integrity, humility, courtesy, wisdom, charity.
Give your goals a deadline and everything will fall in place. Goal Setting is the key to achieve success in anything you do.

Gratefulness is the key to a happy life that we hold in our hands, because if we are not grateful, then no matter how much we have we will not be happy  because we will always want to have something else or something more.
The key to everything is patience. You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not smashing it.
The key to wisdom is knowing all the right questions.
The key to enjoying the journey is being open to the unknown.
Unconditional acceptance of others is the key to happy relationships.
Being brave isnt supposed to be easy, but its the key to moving forward.
The key is to remember there is a tomorrow morning. The dance will continue.
When the right moment appears, the key is to not let it pass.
You may not appreciate the value of a key until you encounter the door it locks or unlocks.
